Desc.entry: Paces is a DCFS approved special school for children between 2 and 18 years of age with neurological motor disorders. The school also provides a holistic developmental programme for children under 2 years of age who have motor disorder or global developmental delay with motor dysfunction. A programme for young adults aged 19 years and over and an intensive programme for adult stroke sufferers are also available. A registered charity. Company limited by guarantee no 4793176. Self or any referral.
